description: Central value of p(C(n,[ n/2 ])), where p()=A001222 (prime factors with multiple counting) applied to A001405(n).
example: n=24: the sums of prime factor exponents when k runs from 0 to 24 is {0,4,4,5,5,7,6,8,6,8,8,9,7,9,8,8,6,8,6,7,5,5,4,4,0}. The central value is 7, so a(24)=7.
author: _Labos Elemer_
